author: Loganwan
title: Another Fire-vehicle for the arsenal
review:
This is a nice little set.  If you are a fan of the City Fire sets like I am, then I think you will like this set.

I like that TLG has made these small 4-wheelers instead of the previous 3-wheelers.  We get a lot more pieces that are usable in other ways, as well as being able to customize this vehicle, which I think it could use a little bit of.

The wheels sit quite wide on the body.  The kit uses a modified 2x2 plate (wide), part number 6157.  It moves the wheels a bit too far outside the body, and gives a funny look.  I think it would have been better to use a more standard modified 2x2 plate (4600).  Luckily an easy fix.

This is a good little set for $2.99, and it fits in well with my Fire vehicles.  It is way outside of reality with no water container for the spray nozzle, but there is nothing that says everything should be logical.

author: Crt2
title: Cute!
review:
I Got This at Target About......2-3 Months Before This Review. It's a Nice Little Set, Nothing to Do with it Though, But It is Good for Extra Wheels or Filling up a Space on Your Road.

 Pros

*Cute!

*Figure has Silver Helmet.

*Good Cheap Source for Wheels.

*Good For Filling Spots in your City's Road or Parking lot.

*CHEAP! 31pcs for $3.00 is a Great Deal!

 Cons

*as with all The Fire sets, No Fire.

*Hose Thing in The Back is Good For Playability. But Sticks out When Driving.

Overall

This is a Really Good Set! I Recommend you Get it If you Can still find it for Cheap!

9/10

 

P.S. You can Get it for around $4.00 Here:

http://www.bricklink.com/search.asp?itemID=92222

author: benhjt
title: its the fire chief
review:
This fire chief got his own 4WD vehicle and a big extinguisher attachment, the silver hat says his the boss, dont need a big fire truck to put out fire ~~~ ehehehe

 

i think you can upgrade the vehicle since he's the fire chief, a bit funny for a small car similar to an off-road buggy, a good buy and nice addition to the fire dept set

author: Master_Wu
title: Love it!
review:
This little quad is just a must have for any Lego fans out there! It's got a posable fire hose and a seat for it on the back as well as the driver seat and steering wheel in the front. As for the minifigure, he's a cool fire chief minifigure with a metallic silver hat and a nicely detailed vest. 

Overall I think this set is really fun and valuable for the money and great for play!
